## Bio

<br>

Dr Tom Hardwicke is a Senior Lecturer at the School of Psychology, University of Sydney, and Senior Editor for Statistics, Transparency, and Rigour, at the journal *Psychological Science*. He works at the intersection of psychology and meta-research (‘research-on-research’) on projects related to transparency, bias, peer review, scientific criticism, and reproducibility. Prior to joining the University of Sydney in 2025, he was a Senior Research Fellow at the University of Melbourne and completed postdoctoral fellowships at the University of Amsterdam, Charité — Universitätsmedizin Berlin, and Stanford University. He received his PhD in Experimental Psychology from University College London in 2016.
